title: 08/31/21 DPS Hour 1 Tom Curran
itunes:title: 08/31/21 DPS Hour 1 Tom Curran
description:
Tom Curran tells Dan that Mac Jones should be the starting QB for the Patriots. Tom says that its really not even close; he says Mac Jones is better than Cam Newton.
